name: Toss-Up
description: Select any Elemental Die to reroll. Can reroll 2 times.
descriptionraw: Select any Elemental Die to <color=#FFFFFFFF>reroll</color>. Can reroll 2 times.
descriptionreplaced: Select any Elemental Die to <color=#FFFFFFFF>reroll</color>. Can reroll 2 times.
storytext: Before the dice are thrown, none can know their own destiny.
source: Reward for meeting the Player Manual's requirements
